column4: What is the command to stop and start/ restart Pulse Audio? I had an application crash and now I have no sound.
then try reloading the pulseaudio daemon
I got a "E: main.c: Failed to kill daemon." (and Failed to kill printed in red)
can you reboot and it still gives you the same issue?
I think it'd be fine on reboot; but I'm in the middle of some moderately complicated web CSS development right now, and I'd prefer not to reboot.
try to kill pulseaudio through your process viewer then reload it by running the pulseaudio comand
its not in my process viewer (but I do have the applet open... I'll close that)
well then if you cant find it, try just running pulseaudio
that way it reloads the daemon
thanks :) what ever happen must have crashed pulse as well as vlc
could be that the pulseaudio daemon glitched and resulted in a crash which took out vlc
true, it could have happened that way as well. Anyhow thanks for your help. I'm going to back to working on this website then.
